Dear @Hagop Ghazarian <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com> ,

 

Kindly advise on the below:

 

Kindly advise if Tanagra stock is having insurance coverage for damages in transit. The damages happened when accidentally the 3 boxes fell from the trolley in the parking area during loading for the Tanagra stock return.

 

Regards,

From: Devalla Srinivasa rao <Devalla.Devalla@chalhoub.com <mailto:Devalla.Devalla@chalhoub.com> >
Sent: Monday, May 26, 2025 9:09 PM
To: Savio Fernandes <Savio.Fernandes@chalhoub.com <mailto:Savio.Fernandes@chalhoub.com> >
Cc: Kumar Veerapathiran <Periya.Veerapathipan@chalhoub.com <mailto:Periya.Veerapathipan@chalhoub.com> >; Clement Dsouza <Clement.Dsouza@chalhoub.com <mailto:Clement.Dsouza@chalhoub.com> >; Charito Gutierrez <Charito.Gutierrez@chalhoub.com <mailto:Charito.Gutierrez@chalhoub.com> >
Subject: TANAGRA RETURN

 

Dear Savio,

 

I hope this message finds you well.

 

I would like to inform you that our delivery captain, Maurice Lamie Boktor, has collected the return items from Tanagra Avenues. He has reported that the three boxes fell from trolley in the parking area while loading. Upon inspection, we noticed that three items are damaged.

 

We opened the cartons in front of Karama, and the damage was evident. Attached are the pictures documenting the condition of the items.

SKU

Description
